name: Item Balance
query:
SELECT
    `tabBin`.item_code AS "Item Code:Link/Item:120",
    `tabItem`.item_name AS "Item Name::150",
    `tabBin`.warehouse AS "Warehouse:Link/Warehouse:150",
    `tabBin`.actual_qty AS "Actual Quantity:Float:120",
    `tabBin`.reserved_qty AS "Reserved Quantity:Float:120",
    `tabBin`.projected_qty AS "Projected Quantity:Float:120",
    `tabBin`.valuation_rate AS "Valuation Rate:Currency:120",
    (`tabBin`.actual_qty * `tabBin`.valuation_rate) AS "Total Value:Currency:150",
    `tabSupplier`.supplier_name AS "Supplier:Link/Supplier:150"
FROM
    `tabBin`
LEFT JOIN
    `tabItem` ON `tabItem`.name = `tabBin`.item_code
LEFT JOIN
    `tabItem Supplier` ON `tabItem Supplier`.parent = `tabItem`.name
LEFT JOIN
    `tabSupplier` ON `tabSupplier`.name = `tabItem Supplier`.supplier
WHERE
    (`tabSupplier`.supplier_name = %(supplier)s OR %(supplier)s IS NULL)
    AND (`tabBin`.warehouse = %(warehouse)s OR %(warehouse)s IS NULL)
    AND (`tabBin`.item_code = %(item_code)s OR %(item_code)s IS NULL)

ORDER BY
    `tabBin`.warehouse ASC, `tabBin`.item_code ASC
